name: Summon_Sentries
display_help: The Sentry Boss can summon 3 Sentry minions of there is trouble.

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Fly
display_help: Lanaru can Fly!

name: Ion_Burst
display_help: Sends a large blast of charged particles at a foe. Deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Ion_Field
display_help: You are taking some energy damage just being near Lanaru!

name: Thunder_Clap
display_help: Lanaru has Disoriented you with his Thunder Clap.

name: Hurricane
display_help: The wind and rain from Lanaru's Hurricane have reduced your range and accuracy.

name: Lightning_Storm
display_help: Lanaru can summon a massive Lightning Storm overhead that will strike any foe that approaches the Witch Doctor. Lightning Bolts from this storm can knock down and damage all foes near the strike, and can cause panic. Lightning Bolts will continue to strike for the lifetime of the storm.

name: Ice_Storm
display_help: The Ice Storm is reducing your movement and attack speeds. You are also taking cold damage over time.

name: Blizzard
display_help: The Blizzard is freezing you. Your Accuracy, movement speed and attack speed are reduced. You are taking damage over time.

name: Freezing_Rain
display_help: The Freezing Rain is chilling you, reducing your Resistance, movement speed and attack speed. You are taking damage over time.

name: Spawn_Natterling
display_help: This power spawns the Merged Natterling Lt.

name: Self_Destruct
display_help: Self Destruct

name: Fly
display_help: Natterlings can Fly!

name: Resistance
display_help: Natterling resistance

name: Fly
display_help: Natterlings can Fly!

name: Pummel
display_help: Natterling brawling attacks

name: Panic
display_help: Natterlings run on animal like instincts and are mostly cowards. They will flee in panic if near death.

name: Scatter_Shards
display_help: Natterlings can hurl shards of themselves in a narrow cone.

name: Sinew
display_help: The Natterling has held you within it's fibrous Sinew.

name: Natterling_Transform
display_help: This power is simply the visual fx for a transformed Natterling Lt.

name: Merge
display_help: Two Natterlings can combine their biomatter to form a larger version of itself!

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Fly
display_help: Ruladak can Fly!

name: Hand_Clap
display_help: Tyrant has Disoriented you with his Hand Clap.

name: Total_Focus
display_help: Tyrant has Disoriented you with his power of Total Focus!

name: Power_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

name: Explosive_Blast
display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

name: Nova
display_help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long

name: Energy_Aura
display_help: You are taking some energy damage just being near Ruladak!

name: Crystal_of_Vigor
display_help: When a Brute minion is in peril, he can release the power in his crystal to give himself and all his nearby allies a buff to their damage.

name: Crystal_of_Corruption
display_help: Ruladak has weakened you and reduced your Damage, your Damage Resistance, and your Defense.

name: Crystal_of_Resilience
display_help: Heals all nearby allies.

name: Summon_Elemental
display_help: The Witch Doctor can summon a Husk to fight at his side.
